name: Empire Szechuan Garden
tagline: 43-42 46th St, Sunnyside, NY 11104. Empire Szechuan Garden is known for its Asian, Chinese, Dinner, and Lunch. Online ordering available!

sections.title: Our reviews
sections.body:
Our reviewsReviews from Grubhub
    Derek
  
      1 review
    The food is delicious! The best part is that delivery is always earlier than estimated.
    Elisa
  
      1 review
    The food was good and they even called to make sure they got the order right
    Andrew
  
      3 reviews
    The tastiest and most consistent take out spot in the area.
    Kristine
  
      Top Reviewer
    Best cold noodles in the area, really great food here.
    Jenise
  
      Top Reviewer
    Was craving but apprehensive and was fully satisfied

sections.title: Reviews from Seamless.com
sections.body:
Reviews from Seamless.com
    Tracy
  
      1 review
    The service was speedy and attentive! The system messed up my address and instead of turning around they called and were patient. I forgot to ask for white rice instead of pork fried rice (I've never been a fan of it) but it was so well done, I didn't mind!
    Jonathan
  
      4 reviews
    Ordered the Sesame Chicken dinner special with pork fried rice and egg roll.  Good meal as always and a lot of food for the price.  My go to Chinese food place in Sunnyside.
    Melissa
  
      Top Reviewer
    My only complaint is that the house noodle soup did not include actual noodles, but 2 bags of those crunchy noodles most places supply as an addition.
    Jonathan
  
      2 reviews
    I love this place....it is my "go-to" place when I am hungry and need some good Asian food, FAST! They are all so nice and kind in the shop as well.
    Mohamed
  
      Top Reviewer
    Best chinese spot in Queens. Love their food and their portions. Always great quality and good delivery time. Currently my go to chinese place!
